attributes.action: Make it law to force a By-election when MPs change Political parties.
attributes.additional_details:
Anna Soubery Conservative, jumped ship to form Change UK. Angela James jumped from the Labour party to the Lib Dems . Luciana Berger jumped from Labour to Change UK, then to the Lib Dems. Philip Lee, conservative jumps ship to join the Lib Dems.
These are just a few, many more have done the same and therefore do not represent the electorate who voted for them!
attributes.background: So many MPs have moved to other parties, on some occasions, more than once and no longer represent the views of their constituents, let alone parliament
